Enter the code we've had sent to your em: Ruẹ udo na avwanre ji ruẹ emovuẹ wẹ
A dish refers to a prepared or cooked it: Ọfe jẹ ohẹ rẹ a ta kẹ a cha nẹ irinẹ
Guọnọ helps you discover, speak and revi: Guọnọ cha uko wẹ mrẹvughe, jẹ vẹ rhọnvwẹ ephẹrẹ Urhobo na
Enter Code Sent To Email: Ruẹ udo reji rhiẹ ẹmovuẹ wẹ
mission_description: Guọnọ onayibo ro tuhọ vwọke irueruo evu rẹ ephẹrẹ Urhobo. Avwanre mudia rere ephẹ́rẹ vwọ rhomarhọnvwon tẹ eruorhua rẹ ephẹrẹ urhobo.
language_description: Ephẹrẹ Urhobo jẹ ẹdọfu, ẹdọfu, ati ẹdọfu ti, ni ibanujẹ, a ko ti sọ ni osise ni Orilẹ-ede Urhobo fun ọpọlọpọ ọdun. Nitorinaa, ni akoko, awọn apakan ti ede naa ti gbagbe, ati pe ni ibanujẹ ti sọnu.
vision_description: Avwanre cha gbobọ mwuẹ ẹfuẹnrẹn vẹ evwioba rẹ eta kpokpọ vẹ evuẹ kpehe ephẹrẹ vẹ urhuemu Urhobo na rẹ avwanre vwọ dua na . Avwanre vwiẹro vwiyọ nẹ  iruo ravwanre cha chẹ otu ri vworuru re guọnọ yono ephẹrẹ vẹ urhuemu Urhobo na asa akpọ na vaba vwo mruphẹn yono vwiyẹ phẹphẹre
vision-description_1: Owọfarọye, avwanre vwiẹro vwiyọ nẹ Otu re diẹ otọ Urhobo na re nabọ riẹn ephẹrẹ Urhobo na jẹ fiotọ vwẹ oma kpatọ kẹ Urhobo asa akpọvaba sa vwọ ghare mamọ ughwẹ rẹ erianriẹn vẹ urhuemu rayen.
future_description: Avwanre phiudugberi nẹ ẹdẹ ọvo kẹre obaroakpọ, Urhobo cha diẹ ephẹrẹ aghwobọvwiyọ vwẹ ubrotọ Urhobo na, echeyono vwẹ uweyono neje,je jẹ vwẹ irere Urhobo eje vwẹ omakparọ vẹ  ẹguọnọ. Vwokugbe, avwanre sa ma akpọ Urhobo.
Encyclopedia_description: Mrẹvughe esiriefe rẹ ephẹrẹ, ikuwanre, vẹ ukuẹriọ uruemu Urhobo
Do you have knowledge about Urhobo langu: Wo vwo erianriẹn kpahe ephẹrẹ vẹ urhuemu Urhobo rasa gharẹ? Cha avwanre uko ruẹ esiri nana do kẹ ivwiẹ recha
Dictionary_description: Iriẹ akpọ Urhobo na erianriẹn rẹ
Comprehensive collection of Urhobo words: Ọghwẹkoko rẹ eta Urhobo vẹ otọ rayen
A traditional Urhobo musical instrument: Ikuotọ unyẹn Urhobo rẹ a vwẹ ukun
The traditional marriage ceremony in Urh: Eruemu rẹ igbeyan vwẹ urhuemu Urhobo
A multi-day celebration involving intric: Eruemu rẹ ọvo-ọvo, ukun, vẹ irhivwi rẹ ohwohwo.
Do you have knowledge about Urhobo langu: Wọ vwo erianriẹn kpahe ephẹrẹ yẹrẹ ẹkuẹrumu rẹ Urhobo wo sa ghare? Cha uko avwanre ghwẹ erianriẹn kẹ uvwiẹ rẹ Urhobo obaro
